Install
-------

.. code-block:: shell

   $ pip install argparse-color-formatter

Usage
-----

Pass in ``argparse_color_formatter.ColorHelpFormatter`` to a new argument parser as ``formatter_class``

.. code-block:: python

   import argparse
   from argparse_color_formatter import ColorHelpFormatter

   parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(
       formatter_class=ColorHelpFormatter
   )
info.name: argparse-color-formatter
info.summary: a ``formatter_class`` for ``argparse`` that deals with ANSI colour escapes. Specifically, this formatter does not count escape characters as displayed characters when wrapping ``argparse``'s help text into the terminal.
